name: 射鱼鱼
description:
IntroductionThis is an underwater fishing game, fishing inside the beautiful sea floor to get gold coins and experience. You can also unlock the various cgs in the album when you reach a certain level.characteristicThe seafloor is rich in marine species and more than 10 kinds of turrets. Here you can catch turtles, clownfish, gold sharks, silver sharks.... Give you a real underwater fishing experience.
Each level 5 upgrade also unlocks the privilege of viewing underwater albums, which record a variety of images.
Decide which fort to use based on the number of gold coins. Then according to the fort to select the right fish to kill, but also let the game has a certain strategic
